title: Upword
description: Create summaries faster with Upword's AI tools.

body.raw:
## Product Information

[![Photo by Anita Chong on Unsplash](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/u0v1th4q/production/8b23dd2d5dab8f320cdb7d11deaea4ce9bc4f49f-1200x1200.png)](https://www.upword.ai/)

This tool is verified because it is either an established company or has good social media presence

Added on November 28

*Free trial* *Freemium*

*Browser Extension*
### SocialLinks

[.](I~https://www.instagram.com/upwordofficial/)
[.](t~https://twitter.com/upword_official)
[.](f~https://www.facebook.com/upwordofficial)
[.](m~mailto:support@upword.ai)

---
## Upword Features
Upword is an AI-powered research tool for individuals and teams. Upword is designed to supercharge your entire research workflow: Extract key ideas from content, capture and edit what you need and create summary documents that you can share with your team.


---

title: Durable
description: Create a website, automate marketing & manage finances in 30 secs

body.raw:
## Product Information

[![Photo by Anita Chong on Unsplash](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/u0v1th4q/production/51fde55567afcd81d357e7ee63e3777a46b0ed81-1680x876.png)](https://durable.co/)

Create a website, automate marketing & manage finances in 30 secs

This tool is verified because it is either an established company or has good social media presence

Added on November 22

*Freemium* Paid plans start from $15/mo

### SocialLinks

[.](I~https://www.instagram.com/durableteam/)
[.](t~https://twitter.com/Durableteam)
[.](l~https://www.linkedin.com/company/durableteam)

---

## Durable Features

Durable AI is an AI-powered website builder designed to help entrepreneurs effortlessly create professional websites. Key features and advantages include:

Rapid site creation: Generate a website in just 30 seconds with AI-generated features
Customization: Edit and enhance websites with logos, photos, custom objects, and more
All-in-one platform: CRM tools, invoicing, promotional content creation, and more
Use cases for Durable AI involve various website-related activities:

Quickly create professional websites for businesses and entrepreneurs
Streamline website management with a unified platform for multiple tasks
Facilitate the process of launching a business online
With a 30-day free trial and plans starting at $15 per month, Durable AI is a trusted solution recommended by various reputable sources.

---
## Similar tools

[Browse 61 AI search engine tools](/)

[Browse 116 AI search engine tools](/)

[Browse 40 AI search engine tools ](/)

---

title: Audyo
description: Create audio like writing a doc

body.raw:
## Product Information

[![Photo by Anita Chong on Unsplash](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/u0v1th4q/production/b6604a2d9dc6fb36c5bc7590308e262c5ecc5065-1917x848.png)](https://www.audyo.ai/)

Create audio like writing a doc

This tool is verified because it is either an established company or has good social media presence

Added on March 2

*Freemium* Paid plans start from $10/mo.

---

## Audyo Features

Audyo is an AI-powered tool designed to create and edit human-like voices by typing. Key features and advantages include:

Easy audio creation: Generate high-quality audio content by simply editing words, rather than manipulating waveform data
Customization: Switch speakers and tweak pronunciations using phonetics for greater control over the resulting audio
Convenience: Access Audyo through sign-in with Google for a seamless user experience
Use cases for Audyo are ideal for various content creators:

Podcasters seeking to incorporate high-quality audio without advanced editing skills
Video producers looking to add voiceovers or narration with minimal effort
Marketers aiming to create engaging audio content for promotional purposes
Overall, Audyo offers a streamlined solution for generating high-quality audio content without the need for extensive audio editing expertise.

---
## Similar tools

[Browse 28 AI audio editing tools.](/)

[Browse 57 AI text to speech tools.](/)

[Browse 45 AI video editing tools.](/)

---

```
Featured on FUTUREPEDIA

body.raw:
## Product Information

[![Photo by Anita Chong on Unsplash](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/u0v1th4q/production/9c70e4df7c3de6044b124984c41bc7791d7f7551-1907x835.png)](https://gptgo.ai/)

ChatGPT combined with Google search

The Futurepedia team has used this tool and recommends it.

Added on March 20

*Free*

*No Signup Required* *Discord Community*

### SocialLinks

[.](d~https://discord.com/invite/c4ttT7yg)

---

## GooGPT Features

GooGPT is a website that integrates chatGPT in Google search results for free.
GooGPT is available across all major languages.
With the help of GooGPT, finding your information will be much faster and easier than searching through traditional Google Search.

---

## Similar tools

[Browse 61 AI image generator tools.](/)

[Browse 116 AI design assistant tools.](/)

[Browse 40 AI art tools. ](/)

---

```
Featured on FUTUREPEDIA

title: StockImg AI
description: AI-powered design service for logos, images, posters, book covers, and more.

body.raw:
## Product Information

[![Photo by Anita Chong on Unsplash](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/u0v1th4q/production/d26dece586aba0c6f60615312bc35894b08d1ba9-1863x913.jpg)](https://stockimg.ai/)

AI-powered design service for logos, images, posters, book covers, and more.

The Futurepedia team has used this tool and recommends it.

Added on December 29


*Free Trial* *Freemium*

Paid plans start from $19/mo

### SocialLinks

[.](t~https://twitter.com/stockimgAI)
[.](I~https://www.instagram.com/stockimg.ai/)
[.](l~https://www.linkedin.com/company/stockimg-ai/)


---

## StockImg AI Features
StockImg AI Features
Stockimg.AI is an AI-driven image generation tool that simplifies the creation of logos, book covers, posters, and other designs.

Key Features:

Wide range of design categories: Access an extensive selection of categories for diverse design projects.
User-friendly interface: Generate images quickly and easily with a simple-to-use platform.
Free trial and AI-made images section: Explore the capabilities of Stockimg.AI with a free trial and preview AI-generated images.
Social media presence: Stay updated on Stockimg.AI's latest news and get support through Twitter, Instagram, and TikTok.
Use Cases:

 Create eye-catching logos for branding and marketing purposes.

 Design engaging book covers to attract readers.

 Generate visually appealing posters for events or promotions.

 Craft unique wallpapers, illustrations, and icons for digital and print projects.

 Develop web and mobile UI designs with AI-generated imagery.

Discover the versatility and efficiency of Stockimg.AI, an AI-powered design tool that helps you create stunning logos, book covers, posters, and more in just seconds, catering to a wide range of design needs.

---

## Similar tools

[Browse 69 AI image generator tools.](/)

[Browse 56 AI design assistant tools.](/)

[Browse 52 AI art tools. ](/)

---

```
Featured on FUTUREPEDIA

```

title: IngestAI
description: Boost Your Business Efficiency with AI-Powered Employee Assistant. Help your employees be always in-the-know, enhancing decision-making, and saving their valuable time!

body.raw:
## Product Information

[![Photo by Anita Chong on Unsplash](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/u0v1th4q/production/fb90f190648d8b3c3b27c292e7826b4375f2e2bb-1900x996.png)](https://ingestai.io/)

Predictive personalization engines for eCommerce and Hospitality

The Futurepedia team has used this tool and recommends it.

Added on March 1


*Freemium* Paid plans start from $39/mo

*API*

---

## IngestAI Features
A tool that helps people turn their knowledge base into a chatbot-like assistant. The tool is compatible with Slack, Discord, Whatsapp, Telegram, and more. It takes minutes to get started and supports uploading Knowledge-base files such as Markdown, TXT, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Notion and Confluence. It will provide accurate AI/Chatbot-generated answers to questions about related materials. People can use it to help answer questions about their product, services, company knowledge base, and more.

---
## Similar tools

[Browse 48 AI human resources tools.](/)

[Browse 96 AI education assistant tools.](/)

[Browse 9 AI memory tools. ](/)

---

```
Featured on FUTUREPEDIA

```
